channel.title: Javascript on Nube
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Nube

item.title: Finding Performance Bottlenecks in JavaScript.
item.description: One of my hobbies is to write (and sometimes re-write) graphics engines. I do this because I love the challenge of writing not only fast code but scalable code and also because I like visual stuff. This time I decide to write one in JavaScript using WebGL and as soon as I have a workable set of API’s I decide to write an simple vortex animation to see how well my new shinny new engine will perform.
